title: The Fish in the Tank
blurb: An extraordinary tale of a small fish named Bubbles determined to find freedom from his confined glass prison.
back_cover_text: Bubbles is a little fish with big dreams. Born and raised in a tank inside a pet store, he has always longed for the vast, open ocean. With the help of his eclectic group of tank-mates, Bubbles devises a daring plan to escape his glass prison. But freedom comes with its own set of challenges. From dodging predators to mastering the currents, Bubbles learns that the journey to the ocean is fraught with peril but also filled with wonder and discovery. Will Bubbles find the freedom he yearns for, or will he discover that home was where he least expected it? Dive into this heartwarming adventure that explores friendship, bravery, and the true meaning of freedom.
subject: a fish in a tank
